00033 #include "node_texture_util.h"
00034 #include "NOD_texture.h"
00035 #include <math.h>
00036 
00037 static bNodeSocketTemplate inputs[]= {
00038     { SOCK_RGBA, 1, "Color", 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f },
00039     { -1, 0, "" }
00040 };
00041 static bNodeSocketTemplate outputs[]= {
00042     { -1, 0, "" }
00043 };
00044 
00045 static void exec(void *data, bNode *node, bNodeStack **in, bNodeStack **UNUSED(out))
00046 {
00047     TexCallData *cdata = (TexCallData *)data;
00048 
00049     if (cdata->do_preview) {
00050         TexParams params;
00051         float col[4];
00052         params_from_cdata(&params, cdata);
00053 
00054         tex_input_rgba(col, in[0], &params, cdata->thread);
00055         tex_do_preview(node, params.previewco, col);
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void register_node_type_tex_viewer(bNodeTreeType *ttype)
00060 {
00061     static bNodeType ntype;
00062     
00063     node_type_base(ttype, &ntype, TEX_NODE_VIEWER, "Viewer", NODE_CLASS_OUTPUT, NODE_PREVIEW);
00064     node_type_socket_templates(&ntype, inputs, outputs);
00065     node_type_size(&ntype, 100, 60, 150);
00066     node_type_exec(&ntype, exec);
00067     
00068     /* Do not allow muting viewer node. */
00069     node_type_internal_connect(&ntype, NULL);
00070     
00071     nodeRegisterType(ttype, &ntype);
00072 }
